participant_2.background:
I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
i like to make clothes.
I love to drive, but if I were blind, I could not do that.
i recently had knee surgery.

content.text: Pretty good! I just took a long, hot bath at the beach.
Oh wow, that sounds amazing! What are you doing today?
Not much, just hanging out. I just had knee surgery, so I'm on bed rest.
Oh no! That sounds really tough. I hope you get better soon.
Thank you! I'm trying to stay positive. I've been making clothes, and I'm a gummy worm maker, so I've been doing a lot of that.
Oh, that's cool! I've never met a gummy worm maker before.
It's a fun job! I love making people happy.
I bet you do! What's your favorite part of your job?
Probably getting to see my product in stores. It's so cool to see people enjoying something that I've created.
That's amazing! I'm sure your product is delicious.
Thank you! I put a lot of love into it.
Well, I'm sure you're going to make a full recovery. You seem like a very positive and upbeat person.
Thank you! I try to be. I know that I'll get through this.
I'm sure you will! Just take it one day at a time.
I will. Thanks for the encouragement
